statements: SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM product_sales WHERE category_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM product_sales WHERE sales_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, category_id FROM product_sales ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM product_sales WHERE category_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY sales_amount DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM product_sales;
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM product_sales WHERE category_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY sales_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM product_sales WHERE product_name ILIKE 'apple%'
SELECT product_name, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM product_sales GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_sales > 1000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC
SELECT category_id, AVG(sales_amount) AS avg_sales FROM product_sales GROUP BY category_id HAVING avg_sales > 500 ORDER BY avg_sales DESC
SELECT * FROM product_sales WHERE sales_amount BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_id, product_name, sales_revenue FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM products JOIN categories ON products.category = categories.category_name GROUP BY category_name;
SELECT product_name, category, sales_revenue FROM products WHERE sales_revenue > 1000 ORDER BY sales_revenue DESC;
SELECT category, AVG(sales_revenue) AS average_revenue FROM products GROUP BY category ORDER BY average_revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT product_name, sales_revenue FROM products WHERE sales_revenue > 1000 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category FROM products WHERE category='Clothing' OR category='Accessories';
SELECT category_name, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM categories JOIN products ON categories.category_id = products.product_id GROUP BY category_name HAVING total_products > 5;
SELECT product_name, SUM(sales_revenue) AS total_revenue FROM products GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_revenue > 5000 ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM product_category;
SELECT category_name, category_id FROM product_category;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT sale_date, quantity FROM sales WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT product_id, product_name, sale_date FROM sales JOIN products ON sales.product_id = products.product_id ORDER BY sale_date;
SELECT * FROM product_category ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category_id = 1 AND price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) AS num_products FROM product_category JOIN products ON product_category.category_id = products.category_id GROUP BY category_name;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM products JOIN sales ON products.product_id = sales.product_id GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT product_name, sale_date, sale_amount FROM products JOIN sales ON products.product_id = sales.product_id ORDER BY sale_date DESC, sale_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT category_name, AVG(avg_revenue) AS average_revenue FROM categories JOIN revenue ON categories.category_id = revenue.category_id GROUP BY category_name;
SELECT product_id, quantity_sold FROM products WHERE category_id = 2 ORDER BY quantity_sold DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT category_id, product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE quantity_sold > 100 ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT sale_id, sale_amount, sale_date FROM sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT category_id, category_name, avg_revenue FROM categories JOIN revenue ON categories.category_id = revenue.category_id;
SELECT product_name, unit_price, quantity_sold FROM products WHERE category_id = 2 ORDER BY quantity_sold DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProductCategory
SELECT product_name, price FROM Product
SELECT category_name, category_id FROM ProductCategory ORDER BY category_id DESC
SELECT sale_id, sale_amount, sale_date FROM Sales WHERE sale_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT category_id, average_revenue FROM Revenue
SELECT * FROM ProductCategory ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Product WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name;

SELECT pc.category_name, p.product_name, s.sale_amount FROM ProductCategory pc JOIN Product p ON pc.category_id = p.category_id JOIN Sales s ON p.product_id = s.product_id WHERE s.sale_amount > 100 ORDER BY pc.category_name ASC, s.sale_amount DESC;

SELECT r.category_id, r.average_revenue, cr.total_revenue FROM Revenue r JOIN CategoryRevenue cr ON r.category_id = cr.category_id WHERE r.average_revenue > 5000 ORDER BY cr.total_revenue DESC, r.category_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
